00032 static int Getsubopt (char **optionp, const char *const *tokens, char **valuep)
00033 {
00034   char *endp, *vstart;
00035   int cnt;
00036 
00037   if (**optionp == '\0')
00038     return -1;
00039 
00040   /* Find end of next token.  */
00041   endp = strchr (*optionp, ',');
00042   if (endp == NULL)
00043     endp = strchr (*optionp, '\0');
00044 
00045   /* Find start of value.  */
00046   vstart = memchr (*optionp, '=', endp - *optionp);
00047   if (vstart == NULL)
00048     vstart = endp;
00049 
00050   /* Try to match the characters between *OPTIONP and VSTART against
00051      one of the TOKENS.  */
00052   for (cnt = 0; tokens[cnt] != NULL; ++cnt)
00053     if (memcmp (*optionp, tokens[cnt], vstart - *optionp) == 0
00054         && tokens[cnt][vstart - *optionp] == '\0')
00055       {
00056         /* We found the current option in TOKENS.  */
00057         *valuep = vstart != endp ? vstart + 1 : NULL;
00058 
00059         if (*endp != '\0')
00060           *endp++ = '\0';
00061         *optionp = endp;
00062 
00063         return cnt;
00064       }
00065 
00066   /* The current suboption does not match any option.  */
00067   *valuep = *optionp;
00068 
00069   if (*endp != '\0')
00070     *endp++ = '\0';
00071   *optionp = endp;
00072 
00073   return -1;
00074 }

00100 fsal_status_t FSAL_InitClientContext( fsal_op_context_t * p_thr_context )
00101 {
00102   
00103   fsal_posixdb_status_t      st;
00104   
00105   /* sanity check */
00106   if (!p_thr_context ) Return( ERR_FSAL_FAULT ,0 , INDEX_FSAL_InitClientContext );
00107 
00108   /* initialy set the export entry to none */
00109   p_thr_context->export_context = NULL;
00110  
00111   st = fsal_posixdb_connect( &global_posixdb_params , &(p_thr_context->p_conn));
00112   if ( FSAL_POSIXDB_IS_ERROR( st ) ) {
00113     DisplayLogLevel( NIV_CRIT, "CRITICAL ERROR: Worker could not connect to database !!!" ) ;
00114     Return( ERR_FSAL_SERVERFAULT ,0 , INDEX_FSAL_InitClientContext );
00115   } else {
00116     DisplayLog( "Worker successfuly connected to database" ) ;
00117   }
00118   
00119   /* sets the credential time */
00120 /*  p_thr_context->credential.last_update = time( NULL );*/
00121   
00122    /* traces: prints p_credential structure */
00123   
00124   /*
00125    DisplayLogJdLevel( fsal_log, NIV_FULL_DEBUG, "credential created:");
00126    DisplayLogJdLevel( fsal_log, NIV_FULL_DEBUG, "\tuid = %d, gid = %d",
00127       p_thr_context->credential.hpss_usercred.SecPWent.Uid, p_thr_context->credential.hpss_usercred.SecPWent.Gid);
00128    DisplayLogJdLevel( fsal_log, NIV_FULL_DEBUG, "\tName = %s",
00129       p_thr_context->credential.hpss_usercred.SecPWent.Name);
00130    
00131    for ( i=0; i< p_thr_context->credential.hpss_usercred.NumGroups; i++ )
00132      DisplayLogJdLevel( fsal_log, NIV_FULL_DEBUG, "\tAlt grp: %d",
00133         p_thr_context->credential.hpss_usercred.AltGroups[i] );
00134 */
00135   Return( ERR_FSAL_NO_ERROR , 0, INDEX_FSAL_InitClientContext );
00136   
00137 }

00139  
00163 fsal_status_t FSAL_GetClientContext(
00164         fsal_op_context_t       * p_thr_context,      /* IN/OUT  */
00165         fsal_export_context_t   * p_export_context,   /* IN */    
00166         fsal_uid_t              uid,                  /* IN */
00167         fsal_gid_t              gid,                  /* IN */
00168         fsal_gid_t              * alt_groups,         /* IN */
00169         fsal_count_t            nb_alt_groups         /* IN */
00170       )
00171 {
00172   
00173   fsal_count_t ng = nb_alt_groups;
00174   unsigned int i;
00175   
00176   /* sanity check */
00177   if (!p_thr_context || !p_export_context )
00178     Return( ERR_FSAL_FAULT ,0 , INDEX_FSAL_GetClientContext );
00179   
00180   /* set the export specific context */
00181   p_thr_context->export_context = p_export_context;
00182   
00183     
00184   /* Extracted from  /opt/hpss/src/nfs/nfsd/nfs_Dispatch.c */
00185   p_thr_context->credential.user = uid ;
00186   p_thr_context->credential.group = gid ;
00187 
00188   
00189   if ( ng > FSAL_NGROUPS_MAX )
00190     ng = FSAL_NGROUPS_MAX ;
00191   if ( ( ng > 0 ) && ( alt_groups == NULL ) )
00192     Return( ERR_FSAL_FAULT, 0, INDEX_FSAL_GetClientContext );
00193   
00194   p_thr_context->credential.nbgroups = ng;
00195   
00196   for ( i = 0 ; i < ng; i++ )
00197     p_thr_context->credential.alt_groups[i] = alt_groups[i];
00198 #if defined( _DEBUG_FSAL ) 
00199   
00200    /* traces: prints p_credential structure */
00201  
00202    DisplayLogJdLevel( fsal_log, NIV_FULL_DEBUG, "credential modified:");
00203    DisplayLogJdLevel( fsal_log, NIV_FULL_DEBUG, "\tuid = %d, gid = %d",
00204       p_thr_context->credential.user, p_thr_context->credential.group);
00205    
00206    for ( i=0; i< p_thr_context->credential.nbgroups; i++ )
00207      DisplayLogJdLevel( fsal_log, NIV_FULL_DEBUG, "\tAlt grp: %d",
00208         p_thr_context->credential.alt_groups[i] );
00209    
00210 #endif
00211     
00212   Return( ERR_FSAL_NO_ERROR, 0, INDEX_FSAL_GetClientContext );
00213   
00214 }
